abstract: A phishing scam spread quickly through Google’s online chat service, stealing the log-in information of users who fell for it.
snippet: A phishing scam spread quickly through Google’s online chat service, stealing the log-in information of users who fell for it.
lead_paragraph: UPDATE 5:30 p.m. : Post modified to clarify comment from Avivah Litan, a security analyst, on restoring infected computers.

headline.main: Fast-Spreading Phishing Scam Hits Gmail Users
